Text: Update on Operating Guides rewriteis a presentation made at the TAC yesterday In addition I have included a few bullet point notes from the meeting We filed questions at the PUC regarding the protocol which are include in the attached documents Please call if you have any questions Robin Forwarded by Robin KittelNAEnron on AM on PM To cc Subject Update on Operating Guides rewrite Thanks to all of those who participated in this weeks Operating Guides review workshop If you put your name on the signin list youve been added to a new ERCOT email distribution list Check below All future notices concerning the NEW Operating Guides will be sent to this Operating Guides list If you would like to be included please contact Kurt at ERCOT There will be a day workshop to discuss comments on the next version of the NEW Operating Guides on January at the Holiday Inn South in Austin On Wednesday well run from to and Thursday from to I intend to start by reviewing Emergency Operations new Part then Parts ERCOT Operations and Interface Operations QSE and TDSP We will then move through the Appendices in order and go back and pick up Part Introduction last Any comments you would like to have considered for inclusion in the next version may be forwarded to Bob Brodie at Additionally I have attached the presentation I made at todays TAC meeting See attached file Jan presentationppt Feel free to contact me directly with any questions or concerns you may have Beth Garza FPL Energy Vacula Kurt on AM To Garza Elizabeth cc Henry Mark Subject Operating Guides list created The following email distribution list has been created at your request Display name Operating Guides WG Email address mailto The members are Adams John Barrett James Bui Charles Calhoun Brad Crews Curtis Darnell David Davis Michael Escamilla Jose Galloway Les Garza Elizabeth Garza Sergio Gurley Larry Henry Mark Huddleston Barry Keetch Rick Kittel Robin McCartney Jack Peterson Tom Reid Walter Ross C Richard Smith Wayman Stanfield Leonard Villanueva Elias Ward Jerry Westbrook Lee Wheeler Ron Willms Jerry Wood Henry Zamora Henry Jan presentationppt

Protocol Questions and Exampleare the questions I have electronically Angela is preparing an electronic list of my hard copy questions from market participants and commission staff The questions in the commissions order I distributed over the weekend will be contained in the list Angela is preparing I will send that as soon as I get it I have attached two examples prepared by TXU in response to Commissions questions and of January ths set of questions See attachment below I will be getting a copy of the transcripts from the January th technical workshop this Thursday or Friday Many of the questions on the list below will be addressed in the transcripts To the extent we disagree with the responses we will bring these issues back up I will email these to you when I get them

Examples in Response to PUCT Staff Questions Regarding Docket No Forwarded by Robin KittelNAEnron on PM Jerry Ward on PM To cc Subject Examples in Response to PUCT Staff Questions Regarding Docket No See attached file Answers to PUCT January questions through Janquestiondoc Forwarded by Jerry WardTexas Utilities on PM Jerry Ward on PM To cc bcc Jerry WardTexas Utilities Subject Examples in Response to PUCT Staff Questions Regarding Docket No OWG Members The following set of responses to the request of the Commission Staff for examples of the operation and clearing of ancillary services markets have incorporated the comments that we received from ERCOT and members of the OWG A new question from the Staff concerning load has been answered by Reliant It is my understanding that these responses will be conveyed to the PUCT by Mark Walker on the th If you have any comments please call me or Mark Jerry Ward Cell Office Answers to PUCT January questions through Janquestiondoc
The Rest of the Questions Filed in ProtocolsDoug and I can go through these and indicate whether we will be offering comments on any of the questions I have done this on hard copy only Robin

Back Ground Information Cc I are preparing the California and Texas comparison today but I wanted to get you some back ground information on Texas The Section documents are draft protocols for the ERCOT ISO and are not final rules but offer a clear direction in market developments
